Pizza
Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
  Pizza.Pizza

public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object

Pizza is a system for finding the best N-topping pizza for a group of people. Written by Matthew Sachs, 2006-03-08, for a lecture on unit testing in Brandeis University's COSI 22a. Source and lecture notes are released into the public domain.

See Also:
http://www.zevils.com/writings/unit-testing/
